review: I used to be broke, and now I'm not! This app really helped me riegn in unneccessary expenses. I would highly reccomend it
This app is a great way for people to visualize their spending.  Using this information, they can make healthier and profitable financial choices.
I saved literally 1,000,000 by simply not eating out.  I was eating waaay to much takeout. Now I develop real estate in Coco Beach
Its a very stupid app, I will continue to waste my money as I please!!
